Yes, I tried this, I installed update 1.01, compress files, kept registry entries - activated ENGLISH - text and sound. So game running just fine. Just don't forget exclude Cracked Reloaded files from AV scanning, otherwise it will delete Cracked content.

Patch 1.01
Here's what the patch fixes:

Single Player
- Improved game stability and performance.
- Fixed issues with flickering on specific water textures.
- Fixed small UI glitches related to different display resolutions.
- â€œWeapon cacheâ€? mission: Mission Zone and Mission Marker no longer stays on
mini-map and on screen after mission completion.
- Crafting items are now auto selected when entering a new crafting category.
- Added sound when zooming in and out the camera with the mouse scroll button.

Map Editor
- Improved white objects thumbnails legibility.
- Users can now start a private match in 1 player on user created maps.

@azaq318

1st off, I appreciate all your time & effort to provide  the rest of us ("us" meaning those who simply DL games, apps, movies, music etc. & not post torrents for others) with quality torrents.

2nd, I appreciate that I have rarely had a problem with anything you provide or understanding your instructions.

3rd, I appreciate that you are one of the few up-loaders who will actually comment back to try to help the rest of "us" figure something out that we should have already known or figured out ourselves.

4th if 99% of the people that are leaving stupid fucking comments would take 2 seconds to look something up or at least try to figure something out maybe more up-loaders would actually comment back.  Who wants to weed through 5 pages of worthless bullshit to find 1 valid question?

5th, thank you again.
